an1.71:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppanna va kusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna va akusala dhamma parihayanti yathayidam, bhikkhave, kalyanamittata.
an1.71:1.2: Kalyanamittassa, bhikkhave, anuppanna ceva kusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna ca akusala dhamma parihayanti”ti.
an1.72:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppanna va akusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna va kusala dhamma parihayanti yathayidam, bhikkhave, anuyogo akusalanam dhammanam, ananuyogo kusalanam dhammanam.
an1.72:1.2: Anuyoga, bhikkhave, akusalanam dhammanam, ananuyoga kusalanam dhammanam anuppanna ceva akusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna ca kusala dhamma parihayanti”ti.
an1.73:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppanna va kusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna va akusala dhamma parihayanti yathayidam, bhikkhave, anuyogo kusalanam dhammanam, ananuyogo akusalanam dhammanam.
an1.73:1.2: Anuyoga, bhikkhave, kusalanam dhammanam, ananuyoga akusalanam dhammanam anuppanna ceva kusala dhamma uppajjanti uppanna ca akusala dhamma parihayanti”ti.
an1.74:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppanna va bojjhanga nuppajjanti uppanna va bojjhanga na bhavanaparipurim gacchanti yathayidam, bhikkhave, ayonisomanasikaro.
an1.74:1.2: Ayoniso, bhikkhave, manasi karoto anuppanna ceva bojjhanga nuppajjanti uppanna ca bojjhanga na bhavanaparipurim gacchanti”ti.
an1.75:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yena anuppanna va bojjhanga uppajjanti uppanna va bojjhanga bhavanaparipurim gacchanti yathayidam, bhikkhave, yonisomanasikaro.
an1.75:1.2: Yoniso, bhikkhave, manasi karoto anuppanna ceva bojjhanga uppajjanti uppanna ca bojjhanga bhavanaparipurim gacchanti”ti.
an1.76:1.2: Etam patikittham, bhikkhave, parihaninam yadidam pannaparihani”ti.
